snippet: Highlights of the year included performances by Lo Còr de la Plana, Yousif Sheronick and Eden MacAdam-Somer in New York.
abstract: Corinna da Fonseca-Wollheim's picks for best musical performances of 2012 reveal common foundations and tangled roots among cultures.
lead_paragraph: Highlights of the year included performances by Lo Còr de la Plana, Yousif Sheronick and Eden MacAdam-Somer in New York.

headline.seo: Lo Còr de la Plana, Yousif Sheronick and Garth Knox
headline.main: Ancient Roots, Twisting Together in Easy Harmony
